Description: TASS: ‚ùóÔ∏èMining and sale of digital currency will not be subject to VAT, follows from the law üìÉ Putin signed a law on taxation of digital currency. The main thing:‚ñ™Digital currency is recognized as property;‚ñ™Mining and sale of digital currency will not be subject to VAT;‚ñ™The operator of the mining infrastructure will have to report to the tax authorities who uses its services to issue cryptocurrency. If such information is not transmitted on time, a fine of 40 thousand rubles will be imposed;‚ñ™In terms of personal income tax payment, the digital currency obtained through mining will be classified as income in kind;‚ñ™The value of the resulting currency will be determined by market quotes. Such income will be taxed on the usual progressive scale, taking into account tax deductions in the amount of mining expenses;‚ñ™Income from the acquisition, sale or other circulation of digital currency will be taxed on a two-stage scale of personal income tax rates (13% in relation to income within 2.4 million rubles and 15% for income exceeding this amount);‚ñ™The patent system and regime are not applied to mining and transactions with digital currency self-employed.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è According to the bill, it is proposed to establish a fine for ...
Description: TASS: The administrative fine for selling cigarettes and vapes to children in the Russian Federation will amount to up to 2 million rubles. Repeated violation of the rules for the sale of tobacco and nicotine-containing products in the Russian Federation will entail a fine of up to 150 thousand rubles, follows from the text of the bill. According to the bill, it is proposed to establish a fine for selling tobacco products to children in the amount of 200 to 300 thousand rubles for citizens, in the amount of 500 to 700 thousand rubles for officials, in the amount of 1.5 to 2 million rubles for legal entities. Currently, the amount of the fine for such a violation for citizens ranges from 40 to 60 thousand rubles, for officials - from 150 to 300 thousand rubles, for legal entities - from 400 to 600 thousand rubles.
